title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Finance and Community Improvement Programme

description.narrative: Key programme objectivesThe overall goal of the programme is to contribute to the reduction of rural poverty and household food insecurity on a sustainable basis. The main objective of the programme is to achieve tangible, measurable and sustainable improvement in the livelihoods and food security of poor rural households in programme areas. The specific objectives will be to empower communities, including women and the poor, to participate in and benefit from community-based investments and to develop institutional capacity to support them in their endeavours.Policy and institutional objectivesThis programme, at completion, is expected to: (i) introduce significant changes into the strategies and the operations of the rural finance sector, particularly in respect of institutional, regulatory and supervision aspects; (ii) enhance the decentralization of economic and administrative decision-making at the district level; and (iii) promote pro-poor investment by the private sector in rural areas.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Finance and Community Improvement Programme
